summary: A young woman, after witnessing her parents' murder as a child in Bogota, grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.
cast: Zoe Saldana|Jordi Mollà|Lennie James|Amandla Stenberg|Michael Vartan|Cliff Curtis|Beto Benites|Jesse Borrego|Cynthia Addai-Robinson|Ángel Garnica|Ofelia Medina|Callum Blue|Sam Douglas|Graham McTavish|Charles Maquignon|Affif Ben Badra|David Clark|Billy Slaughter|Nikea Gamby-Turner|Andrea Helene|John McConnell|Sébastien Peres|Mark De Alessandro|Pablo Vinós|Max Martini|Tony Dalton|Julian Sedgwick|Julien Muller|Guillermo Ríos|Luis Toscano|Javier Escobar|Michael Showers|Wes Cannon|Doug Rao|Reem Kherici|Julie Nicolet|Stéphane Orsolani|Steve Herson|Richard Zeringue|Stephan Brodziak|William Raymond|Alfredo Gonzáles|Alejandro Peraza|Donald Marshall|Mylène Pilutik|Silas Cooper|Ariane Brodier|Donagh Gordon|Benoit Lavelatte|Gene Bryant|Cedric Burton|Nelson Carvajal|Thali Georges|Michael Kuster|Grace LaRocca|Austin Naulty|Jim Nieciecki|Allen Panakal|Frédéric Pfender|Béatrice Sagne-Kurtis|Danzel Square|Robert A. Young
title: Colombiana
